name: Dashboard Plus Graphs
author: qubesoft

sections.description: A plugin that helps to display your stats graph with your blog (posts,pages and comments), authors with their authorized posts,pages and comments.
sections.installation:
Dashboard Plus Graphs is very easy to install like any other wordpress plugin. No need to edit or modify anything here.

  1. Unzip the downloaded zip file ‘dashboard-plus-graphs.zip’.
  2. Upload the ‘ dashboard-plus-graphs ‘ directory to ‘/plugins/’ directory using ftp client or upload and install dashboard-plus-graphs.zip through plugin install wizard in wp admin panel
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. After activating, you will see an option for ‘Dashboard +’ in the admin menu.
sections.faq:
1. Why Dashboard Plus Graphs?

    This plugin supports to import bulk user data.

  2. How to install the plugin?

    Dashboard Plus Graphs is easy to install like other plugins. Upload the dashboard-plus-graphs.zip file through plugin install page through wp admin. Everything will work fine with it.
